title: Will I still be qualified for season rewards?
body: I was looking through the list from 2015 that will disqualify you from season rewards, and one said that if you were temp banned after Aug 10th I believe, you'd be unable to get season rewards, is this still true?

replies.body: This is not currently true because it's from the previous season.  We haven't announced any information on possible season rewards disqualifications.  Anything that might come up would be announced at our [news ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/)page.  If you have any concerns about player behavior or reforming, check out our[ PB boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation)!  Everyone should strive to be stand-up summoners!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=k65Hq4ha,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-23T20:56:46.423+0000)
>
> This is not currently true because it's from the previous season.  We haven't announced any information on possible season rewards disqualifications.  Anything that might come up would be announced at our [news ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/)page.  If you have any concerns about player behavior or reforming, check out our[ PB boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation)!  Everyone should strive to be stand-up summoners!

Thank you for the reply and information I'll be sure to check it out, I was worried that I reformed to late into the season, but another question I may ask is if I feel like a temp ban was unfair (Such as I can see a chat restriction punishment but not a temp ban punishment) or just unnecessary do I report that into a support ticket or post it on that board?

If you are okay with discussing it with your peers, the community can be a great asset in pinpointing areas where negative experiences were caused, as well as advice towards working on that.  If you prefer a more individual review, you can always hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Hope that helps!
